document_data.name: ''The Prince of Al-Qadim''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Prince of Al-Qadim''''' was a [[chapbook]] owned by the [[tiefling]] [[bounty hunter]] [[Havilar]].
document_data.Description: Havilar's copy was torn from thorough use, being a favorite of her boyfriend, [[Aubrin Crownsilver]].
